attributes.action: make Brigg Hatter donate the Flag to Luton Town Football Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
people donated money for a big flag to be made for Wembley and to be used at games in the future-emaphsising our treatment at the hands of the football authorities 
a chap called Brigg Hatter took the cash and got the flag made 
flag hardly seen since even at big high profile games because Brigg Hatter prefers to keep it at his house rather than giving it to trustworthy people to be show at high profile games 
people who donated money rightly pissed off because money was for a flag to be show at high profile games not to sit at the bottom of some divs wardrobe

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
